scripts.build-es2019: git remote remove origin && git remote add origin "git@github.com:$TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG.git" && git fetch --quiet origin && git checkout --quiet es2019 && mkdir "out/2019" && cp -R img "out/2019" && ecmarkup --verbose spec/index.html out/2019/index.html --css out/2019/ecmarkup.css --js out/2019/ecmarkup.js
scripts.build-master: mkdir out && cp -R img out && ecmarkup --verbose spec/index.html out/index.html --css out/ecmarkup.css --js out/ecmarkup.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-master
scripts.build-travis: npm run clean && npm run build-master && npm run build-es2019
scripts.watch: npm run clean && mkdir out && cp -R img out && ecmarkup --watch --verbose spec/index.html out/index.html --css out/ecmarkup.css --js out/ecmarkup.js
